name: bigcapital
description: BigCapital is a financial and business management suite that handles accounting, inventory, point of sale, CRM, and payroll. It is built to help small and medium businesses manage operations through a modular, self-hosted platform.
features: Complete Business Suite: Accounting, inventory, POS, CRM, and payroll in one platform. All-in-one solution.
Financial Management: Comprehensive accounting tools for small and medium businesses. Professional bookkeeping.
Inventory Control: Track stock levels, orders, and warehouse management. Never run out.
Point of Sale: Integrated POS system for retail operations. Streamlined sales.
CRM Integration: Manage customer relationships and sales pipeline. Grow your business.
Payroll Processing: Handle employee payments and tax calculations. Simplified HR.
Modular Design: Use only the features you need, expand as you grow. Flexible scaling.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your business data and operations. Data sovereignty.
